about_the_game:
Nasi Campur (Mixed Rice) is a common and popular food in Indonesia. In the Warung Nasi Campur (Rice Bowl Restaurant) game, you will later sell and meet various types of customers. Cook food according to customer orders, act quickly and upgrade all your stall's facilities to make sales faster and more efficient!

Cook & serve your customers!

Upgrade your facilites!

Act quickly and precisely!

Do daily missions!

Pay debts and unlock stories!



Features:
  • Serve a wide variety of customers
  • Cook a variety of foods
  • Upgrade all facilities
  • Advertise your shop to make it more crowded
  • Complete all daily missions
  • Daily prize collection and lucky spin
  • Unlock interesting stories

And most importantly, collect the money and make your Warung Nasi Campur (Rice Bowl Restaurant) the best in the world!
detailed_description:
Nasi Campur (Mixed Rice) is a common and popular food in Indonesia. In the Warung Nasi Campur (Rice Bowl Restaurant) game, you will later sell and meet various types of customers. Cook food according to customer orders, act quickly and upgrade all your stall's facilities to make sales faster and more efficient!

Cook & serve your customers!

Upgrade your facilites!

Act quickly and precisely!

Do daily missions!

Pay debts and unlock stories!



Features:
  • Serve a wide variety of customers
  • Cook a variety of foods
  • Upgrade all facilities
  • Advertise your shop to make it more crowded
  • Complete all daily missions
  • Daily prize collection and lucky spin
  • Unlock interesting stories

And most importantly, collect the money and make your Warung Nasi Campur (Rice Bowl Restaurant) the best in the world!

name: Rice Bowl Restaurant Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 Ghz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz or Faster Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Meet various customers, cook and serve them quickly and precisely!
supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Indonesian*, Malay
*languages with full audio support
